posts.text: Either you are personally in violation of IP or your skeet was fair use. But OpenAI isn't in violation anymore than an art school is for producing talented artists.

reply_context.text: I don't think it's the dancing: I think they just super over-indexed on realism. I think this has been a general trend with video models. Publicly available video footage of real people is a basically bottomless dataset, and actively avoiding artistic content mitigates IP risk.

posts.text: I don't think it's the dancing: I think they just super over-indexed on realism. I think this has been a general trend with video models. Publicly available video footage of real people is a basically bottomless dataset, and actively avoiding artistic content mitigates IP risk.
